document.heading: Advisory Neighborhood Commission Vacancy Amendment Act of 1995

history.narrative: Law 11-66, the “Advisory Neighborhood Commission Vacancy Amendment Act of 1995,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 11-113, which was referred to the Committee on Government Operations. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on July 11, 1995, and July 29, 1995, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on August 9, 1995, it was assigned Act No. 11-129 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 11-66 became effective on October 26, 1995.
